entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
